xyz.thepathfinder.android

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.websocket.Endpoint
      • xyz.thepathfinder.android.Connection

  •  class Connection
extends Endpoint
    Controls access the web socket connection with the Pathfinder sever. To gain access to the connection use PathfinderServices.getConnection().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Logger logger
      Logs all outgoing messages through the web socket.
      private MessageHandler messageHandler
      Handles incoming web socket messages.
      private long sentMessageCount
      Number of messages sent through the web socket.
      private PathfinderServices services
      Access to the model registry to notify Models of incoming web socket messages.
      private Session session
      The web socket session used to send messages through the web socket.
      private String userCredentials
      The user's credentials to the Pathfinder server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Connection(String userCredentials)
      Constructs a connection object that controls access to the web socket connection with the Pathfinder Server.

    • Method Summary

        Throws:
